customProperties.forgingConditions: Must be forged by someone with a total of 50+ points between STR, DEX and CON.
customProperties.armorEffects: Armor reduces damage from Fire/Cold/Lightning/Acid/Poison damage by 5. After the armor reduces 25 damage, the wearer and all creatures within 10ft of them take 10 Force damage (the wearer cannot resist this damage).

entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be forged by someone with a total of 50+ points between STR, DEX and CON.

Armor Effects: Armor reduces damage from Fire/Cold/Lightning/Acid/Poison damage by 5. After the armor reduces 25 damage, the wearer and all creatures within 10ft of them take 10 Force damage (the wearer cannot resist this damage).
Weapon Effects: Every attack made with this weapon charges it. Every 5th attack hit with this weapon deals an additional 15 Force damage.
